entities

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Controller

  • public final class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that accepts and handles requests from other modules e.g. the web module.

      • addConnection

        public Connection addConnection(java.lang.String connectionName,
                       ConnectionType connectionType,
                       java.lang.String location,
                       java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String sshUsername,
                       java.lang.String keyFileName,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> structure)
                         throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException,
                                InvalidStructureException
        Adds a connection to the system.
        Parameters:
        connectionName - name of the connection
        connectionType - the type of the connection (e.g. SVN, ILIAS)
        location - the location (address) of the data source
        username - the username to login
        password - the password for the username
        sshUsername - the sshUsername to connect via ssh
        keyFileName - a keyfile to authenticate via ssh
        structure - the submission structure of the data source
        Returns:
        the created connection
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if saving to state fails
        InvalidStructureException - if the specified structure is invalid

      • updateConnection

        public Connection updateConnection(int id,
                          java.lang.String connectionName,
                          ConnectionType connectionType,
                          java.lang.String location,
                          java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String sshUsername,
                          java.lang.String keyFileName,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> structure)
                            throws InvalidStructureException,
                                   org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Updates a connection with new information.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the updated connection
        connectionName - the new name of the connection
        connectionType - the new ConnectionType (SVN, ILIAS)
        location - the new address of the data source
        username - the new login username
        password - the new password for the username
        sshUsername - the new ssh username
        keyFileName - the new keyfile for the ssh username
        structure - the new submission structure
        Returns:
        the updated connection
        Throws:
        InvalidStructureException - if the submission structure is invalid
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if saving to state fails

      • deleteConnection

        public Connection deleteConnection(int connectionId)
                            throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException,
                                   ConnectionUsedException
        Removes a Connection from the connections list.
        Parameters:
        connectionId - the id of Connection that should be removed
        Returns:
        the removed Course on success, null otherwise
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the saving to the state fails.
        ConnectionUsedException - if the connection is still used

      • addExercise

        public Exercise addExercise(int courseId,
                   int connectionId,
                   ExerciseMetadata metadata)
                     throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException,
                            WrongDateException
        Creates an exercise from meta data, adds it to a course and starts it.
        Parameters:
        courseId - the id of the course the exercise belongs to.
        connectionId - the id of the connection
        metadata - the meta data for the exercise
        Returns:
        the added exercise
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the state can't be saved
        WrongDateException - if the deadline is before the starttime

      • getExercise

        public Exercise getExercise(int courseId,
                   int exerciseId)
        Returns the exercise with the given id.
        Parameters:
        courseId - the id of the course containing the exercise
        exerciseId - the id of the exercise
        Returns:
        the exercise identified by the id.

      • updateExercise

        public Exercise updateExercise(int courseId,
                      int exerciseId,
                      int connectionId,
                      ExerciseMetadata metadata)
                        throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException,
                               WrongDateException
        Replaces the ExerciseContext of a course with the one given as argument.
        Parameters:
        courseId - the id of Course that contains the exercise.
        exerciseId - the id of the exercise.
        connectionId - the id of the connection used by the exercise
        metadata - the meta date for the exercise
        Returns:
        the updated exercise
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the state can't be saved
        WrongDateException - if the deadline is before the starttime

        exerciseId - the id of the exercise to be removed
        Returns:
        the removed exercise
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the saving to the state fails.
